name: FTextBlockStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an STextBlock

Font: Font family and size to be used when displaying this text.
ColorAndOpacity: The color and opacity of this text
ShadowOffset: How much should the shadow be offset? An offset of 0 implies no shadow.
ShadowColorAndOpacity: The color and opacity of the shadow
SelectedBackgroundColor: The background color of selected text
StrikeBrush: The brush used to draw an strike through the text (if any)
UnderlineBrush: The brush used to draw an underline under the text (if any)
TransformPolicy: The Text Transform Policy (defaults to None)
OverflowPolicy: Determines what happens to text that is clipped and doesn't fit within the clip rect of a text widget
